feels.name: Joy
feels.quote: Valancy shivered like a tree the wind stirs suddenly. Something seemed to sweep over her soul. 'My Blue Castle!' she said. 'Oh, my Blue Castle!'

feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: Valancy shivered like a tree the wind stirs suddenly. Something seemed to sweep over her soul.

feels.name: Laughter
feels.quote: Valancy wanted to go off into a peal of laughter. But she only said: 'Me?'

feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: Valancy stared at Cousin Georgiana for a moment. Then she wanted to go off into a peal of laughter. But she only said: 'Me?'

feels.name: Relief
feels.quote: Valancy smiled very radiantly at Cousin Georgiana, who, she remembered, as of some one known a long time ago, had really been not a bad little creature.

feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: Cousin Georgiana stared. 'Surely you remember Edward Beck,' she said reproachfully. 'He lives in that lovely house on the Port Lawrence road and he comes to our church—regularly. You must remember him.'

feels.name: Disbelief
feels.quote: Cousin Georgiana stopped stock-still and stared at Valancy. 'Married!' she said vacantly. 'Married!'

feels.name: Despair
feels.quote: 'Oh, Doss, what have you done? What have you done?'

feels.name: Anxiety
feels.quote: 'Doss, dear—I’m an old woman—are you trying to make fun of me?'
